thread.title: Carlos Manzanares Grillo
thread.title_full: es.hudsonreed.com evaluado por Carlos Manzanares Grillo

author: Carlos Manzanares Grillo
title: Carlos Manzanares Grillo
text: Always receive order and delivery status on time and in my own Spanish language what is to be appreciated. Also every enquiry/question made answered the same day. Will for sure continue buying and recomend. Package in good condition.
